title: Anyone else miss this version of Katarina Dx and the old masteries/runes

embed.description: Welcome to the League of Legends Champion Spotlight. Go after your enemies with the voracity of Katarina, the Sinister Blade. Check out the full video for a guide to Kat's abilities, gameplay, and suggested build.

body:
I miss when Katarina had no delays, she still took skill too when I played in higher elo. It's just the low elos couldnt handle it so they changed her. :( feelsbad. Like no other assassin has delays but she does. rip.

Also her old running animation was so badass. I miss that. Can i also mention I miss those runes and masteries. Like what happened to League lol

replies.body: Old Katarina was just an AP Master Yi.
yes old runes and masteries was more strong and better. but old kata she was strong she can adc in a sec now and you think to buff her they will never do that
I miss that splash art, but I don't miss her old "click here for Sunfire Cape" W.

Katarina main here, I played both old and new Kat. Sorry to break it to you, but Katarina took little to no skill to play before her rework. It was the same combo over and over again, with no real substance  to gameplay. She was a face roll champion and while I understand it's hard to accept that fact, it's very much true. Old Kat compared to new Kat, new Kat is far superior. She has way more outplay potential, she doesn't feel so linear and boring, she in my opinion can win a game much easier compared to old Kat, and overall can do more damage. The change was what she needed, and I love it. They changed her because she was unskilled, boring, and a cancer to the game. Now, she isn't. Everytime I see a Katarina main say they wished they had old Kata back, all I see is someone complaining they don't get to just face roll the keyboard anymore.
